00029 void Settings::ReadVideo()
00030 {
00031     TiXmlDocument config("video.xml");
00032 
00033     if(!config.LoadFile())
00034         throw tbe::Exception("ReadVideo; Open file error");
00035 
00036     TiXmlNode* root = config.FirstChildElement();
00037 
00038     for(TiXmlElement* node2 = root->FirstChildElement(); node2; node2 = node2->NextSiblingElement())
00039     {
00040         string name = node2->Attribute("name");
00041 
00042         int value = 0;
00043         node2->Attribute("value", &value);
00044 
00045         if(name == "width") video.screenSize.x = value;
00046         if(name == "height") video.screenSize.y = value;
00047         if(name == "bits") video.bits = *reinterpret_cast<unsigned*>(&value);
00048         if(name == "antialiasing") video.antialiasing = *reinterpret_cast<unsigned*>(&value);
00049         if(name == "fullscreen") video.fullScreen = value;
00050         if(name == "useppe")
00051         {
00052             video.usePpe = value;
00053 
00054             node2->QueryValueAttribute("boostIntensity", &video.ppe.boostIntensity);
00055 
00056             node2->QueryValueAttribute("dammageColor", &video.ppe.dammageColor);
00057 
00058             node2->QueryValueAttribute("gameoverPass", &video.ppe.gameoverPass);
00059 
00060             node2->QueryValueAttribute("bullettimeColor", &video.ppe.bullettimeColor);
00061             node2->QueryValueAttribute("bullettimeSize", &video.ppe.bullettimeSize);
00062 
00063             node2->QueryValueAttribute("worldSize", &video.ppe.worldSize);
00064             node2->QueryValueAttribute("worldThershold", &video.ppe.worldThershold);
00065             node2->QueryValueAttribute("worldIntensity", &video.ppe.worldIntensity);
00066             node2->QueryValueAttribute("worldBlurPass", &video.ppe.worldBlurPass);
00067         }
00068     }
00069 }

00071 void Settings::ReadControl()
00072 {
00073     control.keyboard.clear();
00074     control.mouse.clear();
00075 
00076     TiXmlDocument config("control.xml");
00077 
00078     if(!config.LoadFile())
00079         throw tbe::Exception("ReadControl; nOpen file error");
00080 
00081     TiXmlNode* root = config.FirstChildElement();
00082 
00083     for(TiXmlElement* node2 = root->FirstChildElement(); node2; node2 = node2->NextSiblingElement())
00084     {
00085         string name = node2->Attribute("name");
00086 
00087         int key = -1;
00088         node2->QueryIntAttribute("key", &key);
00089 
00090         if(key != -1)
00091             control.keyboard[name] = key;
00092 
00093         int mouse = -1;
00094         node2->QueryIntAttribute("mouse", &mouse);
00095 
00096         if(mouse != -1)
00097             control.mouse[name] = mouse;
00098     }
00099 }

00101 void Settings::ReadAi()
00102 {
00103     map<string, float*> fltbinder;
00104     map<string, unsigned*> unsbinder;
00105 
00106     unsbinder["SWITCH_TARGET_TIME"] = &ai.switchTargetTime;
00107     unsbinder["CRITICAL_LIFE_VALUE"] = &ai.criticalLifeValue;
00108     unsbinder["CRITICAL_AMMO_VALUE"] = &ai.criticalAmmoValue;
00109     unsbinder["SHOOT_GUST_COUNT"] = &ai.shootGustCount;
00110     unsbinder["SHOOT_GUST_TIME"] = &ai.shootGustTime;
00111 
00112     fltbinder["DYNAMIC_INTERACTION"] = &ai.dynamicInteraction;
00113     fltbinder["SHOOT_ACCURACY"] = &ai.shootAccuracy;
00114 
00115     TiXmlDocument config("ai.xml");
00116 
00117     if(!config.LoadFile())
00118         throw tbe::Exception("ReadAi; Open file error");
00119 
00120     TiXmlNode* root = config.FirstChildElement();
00121 
00122     for(TiXmlElement* node2 = root->FirstChildElement(); node2; node2 = node2->NextSiblingElement())
00123     {
00124         const char* name = node2->Attribute("name");
00125 
00126         if(unsbinder.count(name))
00127             node2->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("value", unsbinder[name]);
00128         else if(fltbinder.count(name))
00129             node2->QueryFloatAttribute("value", fltbinder[name]);
00130     }
00131 }

00146     floatbinder["Player.JumpForce"] = &world.playerJumpForce;

00148     floatbinder["Player.Masse"] = &world.playerMasse;

00152

00163     floatbinder["Weapon.Masse"] = &world.weaponMasse;
00164 
00165     floatbinder["Jumper.LifeInit"] = &world.jumperLifeInit;
00166     floatbinder["Jumper.LifeDown"] = &world.jumperLifeDown;
00167     longbinder["Jumper.Number"] = &world.jumperNumber;
00168     vec3fbinder["Jumper.Gravity"] = &world.jumperGravity;
00169 
00170     floatbinder["Teleporter.LifeInit"] = &world.teleporterLifeInit;
00171     floatbinder["Teleporter.LifeDown"] = &world.teleporterLifeDown;
00172     longbinder["Teleporter.Number"] = &world.teleporterNumber;
00173     vec3fbinder["Teleporter.Gravity"] = &world.teleporterGravity;
00174 
00175     longbinder["Item.RespawnTime"] = &world.itemRespawnTime;
00176 
00177     TiXmlDocument config("world.xml");
00178 
00179     if(!config.LoadFile())
00180         throw tbe::Exception("ReadPhysic; Open file error");
00181 
00182     TiXmlNode* root = config.FirstChildElement();
00183 
00184     for(TiXmlElement* node2 = root->FirstChildElement(); node2; node2 = node2->NextSiblingElement())
00185     {
00186         const char* name = node2->Attribute("name");
00187 
00188         if(floatbinder.count(name))
00189             node2->QueryFloatAttribute("value", floatbinder[name]);
00190 
00191         else if(vec3fbinder.count(name))
00192             node2->QueryValueAttribute<Vector3f > ("value", vec3fbinder[name]);
00193 
00194         else if(longbinder.count(name))
00195             node2->QueryValueAttribute<long>("value", longbinder[name]);
00196     }
00197 }

00199 inline bool ScoreSort(const Settings::ScoreInfo& p1, const Settings::ScoreInfo& p2)
00200 {
00201     if(p1.playerName == p2.playerName)
00202         return p1.score > p2.score;
00203     else
00204         return p1.playerName > p2.playerName;
00205 }
00206 
00207 inline bool ScoreUnique(const Settings::ScoreInfo& p1, const Settings::ScoreInfo& p2)
00208 {
00209     return (p1.playerName == p2.playerName && p1.playMod == p2.playMod);
00210 }

00212 void Settings::ReadScoreInfo()
00213 {
00214     availableScore.clear();
00215 
00216     TiXmlDocument config("score.xml");
00217 
00218     if(!config.LoadFile())
00219         throw tbe::Exception("ReadScoreInfo; Open file error");
00220 
00221     TiXmlNode* root = config.FirstChildElement();
00222 
00223     for(TiXmlElement* node = root->FirstChildElement(); node; node = node->NextSiblingElement())
00224     {
00225         ScoreInfo entry;
00226 
00227         entry.playMod = 0;
00228         entry.playersCount = 0;
00229         entry.playTime = 0;
00230         entry.timestamp = 0;
00231         entry.score = 0;
00232 
00233         node->QueryValueAttribute<string > ("playerName", &entry.playerName);
00234         node->QueryValueAttribute<string > ("playerModel", &entry.playerModel);
00235 
00236         node->QueryValueAttribute<string > ("levelName", &entry.levelName);
00237         node->QueryValueAttribute<string > ("levelPath", &entry.levelPath);
00238 
00239         node->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("playMod", &entry.playMod);
00240         node->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("playTime", &entry.playTime);
00241 
00242         node->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("playersCount", &entry.playersCount);
00243 
00244         node->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("timestamp", &entry.timestamp);
00245 
00246         node->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("score", &entry.score);
00247 
00248         availableScore.push_back(entry);
00249     }
00250 
00251     sort(availableScore.begin(), availableScore.end(), ScoreSort);
00252 }

00255 {
00256     using namespace boost::filesystem;
00257 
00258     availablePlayer.clear();

00260     directory_iterator end;
00261     for(directory_iterator it(PLAYERS_DIR); it != end; it++)

00264 
00265         if(filename.extension() == ".bpd")

00274 void Settings::ReadProfiles()
00275 {
00276     TiXmlDocument profilesDoc("profiles.xml");
00277 
00278     if(profilesDoc.LoadFile())
00279     {
00280         TiXmlElement* root = profilesDoc.FirstChildElement();
00281 
00282         TiXmlElement* defprofil = root->FirstChildElement();
00283         profile.name = defprofil->Attribute("name");
00284         defprofil->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("index", &profile.index);
00285     }
00286     else
00287     {
00288         TiXmlElement root("root");
00289 
00290         TiXmlElement defprofile("profile");
00291 
00292         string name = "Joueur";
00293 
00294         #ifdef COMPILE_FOR_WINDOWS
00295         {
00296             DWORD bufSize = 255;
00297             char userName[bufSize];
00298             GetUserName(userName, &bufSize);
00299             name = userName;
00300         }
00301         #endif
00302 
00303         defprofile.SetAttribute("name", name);
00304         defprofile.SetAttribute("index", 0);
00305 
00306         profile.name = name;
00307         profile.index = 0;
00308 
00309         root.InsertEndChild(defprofile);
00310 
00311         TiXmlDeclaration dec("1.0", "ISO-8859-1", "");
00312         profilesDoc.InsertEndChild(dec);
00313         profilesDoc.InsertEndChild(root);
00314         profilesDoc.SaveFile();
00315     }
00316 }

00318 void Settings::ReadCampaign()
00319 {
00320     TiXmlDocument config("campaign.xml");
00321 
00322     if(!config.LoadFile())
00323         throw tbe::Exception("ReadCampaign; Open file error");
00324 
00325     campaign.maps.clear();
00326 
00327     TiXmlNode* root = config.FirstChildElement();
00328 
00329     for(TiXmlElement* node = root->FirstChildElement(); node; node = node->NextSiblingElement())
00330     {
00331         PartySetting party;
00332 
00333         party.playMap = MapInfo(node->Attribute("map"));
00334 
00335         node->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("playMode", &party.playMod);
00336         node->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("playTime", &party.playTime);
00337 
00338         node->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("playerCount", &party.playerCount);
00339 
00340         node->QueryValueAttribute<unsigned>("winCond", &party.winCond);
00341 
00342         party.curLevel = campaign.maps.size();
00343 
00344         campaign.maps.push_back(party);
00345     }
00346 }

00382 void Settings::SaveVideo()
00383 {
00384     TiXmlDocument config("video.xml");
00385 
00386     if(!config.LoadFile())
00387         throw tbe::Exception("SaveVideo; Open file error");
00388 
00389     TiXmlNode * root = config.FirstChildElement();
00390 
00391     for(TiXmlElement* node2 = root->FirstChildElement(); node2; node2 = node2->NextSiblingElement())
00392     {
00393         string name = node2->Attribute("name");
00394 
00395         if(name == "width") node2->SetAttribute("value", video.screenSize.x);
00396         if(name == "height") node2->SetAttribute("value", video.screenSize.y);
00397         if(name == "bits") node2->SetAttribute("value", *reinterpret_cast<const int*>(&video.bits));
00398         if(name == "antialiasing") node2->SetAttribute("value", *reinterpret_cast<const int*>(&video.antialiasing));
00399         if(name == "fullscreen") node2->SetAttribute("value", video.fullScreen);
00400 
00401         if(name == "useppe") node2->SetAttribute("value", video.usePpe);
00402     }
00403 
00404     config.SaveFile();
00405 }

00407 void Settings::SaveControl()
00408 {
00409     TiXmlDocument config("control.xml");
00410 
00411     if(!config.LoadFile())
00412         throw tbe::Exception("SaveControl; Open file error");
00413 
00414     TiXmlNode * root = config.FirstChildElement();
00415 
00416     vector<string> actions;
00417 
00418     actions.push_back("forward");
00419     actions.push_back("backward");
00420     actions.push_back("strafRight");
00421     actions.push_back("strafLeft");
00422     actions.push_back("jump");
00423     actions.push_back("boost");
00424     actions.push_back("shoot");
00425     actions.push_back("bullettime");
00426     actions.push_back("switchUpWeapon");
00427     actions.push_back("switchDownWeapon");
00428 
00429     for(TiXmlElement* node2 = root->FirstChildElement(); node2; node2 = node2->NextSiblingElement())
00430     {
00431         string name = node2->Attribute("name");
00432 
00433         for(unsigned i = 0; i < actions.size(); i++)
00434         {
00435             if(name == actions[i])
00436             {
00437                 map<string, int>::const_iterator keyItt = control.keyboard.find(actions[i]);
00438                 map<string, int>::const_iterator mouseItt = control.mouse.find(actions[i]);
00439 
00440                 node2->RemoveAttribute("key");
00441                 node2->RemoveAttribute("mouse");
00442 
00443                 if(keyItt != control.keyboard.end())
00444                     node2->SetAttribute("key", keyItt->second);
00445 
00446                 else
00447 
00448                     if(mouseItt != control.mouse.end())
00449                     node2->SetAttribute("mouse", mouseItt->second);
00450 
00451                 break;
00452             }
00453         }
00454     }
00455 
00456     config.SaveFile();
00457 }

00459 void Settings::SaveProfiles()
00460 {
00461     TiXmlDocument profilesDoc("profiles.xml");
00462 
00463     if(!profilesDoc.LoadFile())
00464         throw tbe::Exception("Settings::SaveProfiles; Open file error");
00465 
00466     TiXmlElement* root = profilesDoc.FirstChildElement();
00467     TiXmlElement* defprofil = root->FirstChildElement();
00468 
00469     defprofil->SetAttribute("name", profile.name);
00470     defprofil->SetAttribute("index", profile.index);
00471 
00472     profilesDoc.SaveFile();
00473 }

00482 void Settings::FillWindowSettingsFromGui(tbe::gui::GuiManager* guiManager)
00483 {
00484     char sep;
00485 
00486     istringstream exp(guiManager->GetControl("screenSize")->GetLabel());
00487     exp >> video.screenSize.x >> sep >> video.screenSize.y >> sep >> video.bits;
00488 
00489     video.usePpe = guiManager->GetControl<SwitchString > ("usePpe")->GetData().GetValue<bool>();
00490     video.fullScreen = guiManager->GetControl<SwitchString > ("fullScreen")->GetData().GetValue<bool>();
00491     video.antialiasing = guiManager->GetControl<SwitchString > ("antiAliasing")->GetData().GetValue<unsigned >();
00492 }

00494 void Settings::FillControlSettingsFromGui(tbe::gui::GuiManager* guiManager)
00495 {
00496     control.keyboard.clear();
00497     control.mouse.clear();
00498 
00499     vector<string> actions;
00500 
00501     actions.push_back("forward");
00502     actions.push_back("backward");
00503     actions.push_back("strafRight");
00504     actions.push_back("strafLeft");
00505     actions.push_back("jump");
00506     actions.push_back("boost");
00507     actions.push_back("shoot");
00508     actions.push_back("bullettime");
00509     actions.push_back("switchUpWeapon");
00510     actions.push_back("switchDownWeapon");
00511 
00512     for(unsigned i = 0; i < actions.size(); i++)
00513     {
00514         int key = guiManager->GetControl<KeyConfig > (actions[i])->GetKeyCode(),
00515                 mouse = guiManager->GetControl<KeyConfig > (actions[i])->GetMouseCode();
00516 
00517         if(key != -1)
00518             control.keyboard[actions[i]] = key;
00519 
00520         else if(mouse != -1)
00521             control.mouse[actions[i]] = mouse;
00522     }
00523 
00524 }

00531 Settings::MapInfo::MapInfo(std::string path)
00532 {
00533     this->file = path;
00534     this->name = "Unknown";
00535 
00536     ifstream file(path.c_str());
00537 
00538     if(!file)
00539         throw Exception("Settings::MapInfo::MapInfo; Open file error (%s)", path.c_str());
00540 
00541     string buffer;
00542 
00543     while(tools::getline(file, buffer))
00544     {
00545         if(buffer == ".map")
00546         {
00547             if(buffer.empty() || buffer[0] == '#')
00548                 continue;
00549 
00550             while(tools::getline(file, buffer))
00551             {
00552                 if(buffer.empty() || buffer[0] == '#')
00553                     continue;
00554 
00555                 if(buffer.find("name") != string::npos)
00556                     name = buffer.substr(buffer.find_first_of('=') + 1);
00557 
00558                 break;
00559             }
00560 
00561             break;
00562         }
00563     }
00564 }

00571 Settings::PlayerInfo::PlayerInfo(std::string path)
00572 {
00573     this->file = path;
00574 
00575     map<string, string> attMap;
00576 
00577     ifstream file(path.c_str());
00578 
00579     if(!file)
00580         throw Exception("Settings::PlayerInfo::PlayerInfo; Open file error (%s)", path.c_str());
00581 
00582     string buffer;
00583 
00584     while(tools::getline(file, buffer))
00585     {
00586         if(buffer.empty() || buffer[0] == '#')
00587             continue;
00588 
00589         int eqPos = buffer.find_first_of('=');
00590         string key(buffer, 0, eqPos), value(buffer, eqPos + 1);
00591         attMap[key] = value;
00592     }
00593 
00594     this->name = attMap["name"];
00595     this->nick = attMap["name"];
00596     this->model = attMap["model"];
00597 }
